message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you at a starting price of $15,000. I believe it holds significant value that could greatly benefit you.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but given my budget constraints, I am only willing to pay up to $10,000 for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $15,000 is already a very competitive price for this product.  Could you meet me halfway at $12,500?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. Unfortunately, I still cannot meet at $12,500. My maximum budget remains at $10,000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
